div.p:
Increase in number of students enrolled in
college prep programming

img.title: Holyoke Public Schools
img.alt: Holyoke Public Schools

p.span: Youth sports has been and will continue to be an outstanding platform to develop better athletes and better people through character development. Let's apply the lessons of youth sports participation: resilience, grit, determination and selflessness, to name a few, to the current challenge we are all facing in the world today.

p.a: How to Talk to Young Athletes About Coronavirus

div.span: Coaches and parents won't be able to erase the disappointment of athletes, but they can provide advice and perspective during this difficult time.

img.title: Holyoke Public Schools
img.alt: Holyoke Public Schools

img.alt: Enrichment at Lawrence

div.class: wpb_text_column wpb_content_element wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_left-to-right left-to-right vc_custom_1478119368176

div.p: HPS is taking learning outside the classroom. Thanks to partnerships with many local and national organizations we have doubled enrichment opportunities each week to engage and inspire students. The full school day in our elementary and middle schools provides expanded opportunities for students to explore their interests in the sciences, the arts, sports, and local and world cultures

img.alt: Access to Technology image

div.class: wpb_text_column wpb_content_element wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_left-to-right left-to-right vc_custom_1505757898439

div.p: Today’s students are tomorrow’s engineers, scientists, researchers and programmers. Through new technology and online programs, we’re connecting students with the opportunities that await them beyond high school.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid bg-overlay vc_custom_1531941423767 vc_row-has-fill
wpb_text_column wpb_content_element wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_bottom-to-top bottom-to-top vc_custom_1478573103611 whiteOverlayText

div.p: At HPS, we know that students do best when they pursue their passions and are trusted to pick their pathway.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-custom vc_btn3-icon-right

img.alt: Antoine Rodrigues and Family after Graduation

div.class: wpb_text_column wpb_content_element wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_left-to-right left-to-right vc_custom_1478119411308

div.h2: Improved High School Experience for All
div.p: HPS’ redesigned high school experience focuses on providing real-world learning opportunities for every student. We’ve quadrupled the number of college courses HPS high school students can access on and off campus through partnerships with HCC, Westfield State and UMass.

9th grade students have the opportunity to explore a range of college and career pathways. In 10th-12th grade, students focus on their interests and develop plans for success beyond HPS. We welcome and support overaged and under credited students back to school with new pathways to the diploma.

img.alt: Violin options

div.class: wpb_text_column wpb_content_element wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_left-to-right left-to-right vc_custom_1544796131505

div.p: At HPS, we understand that each student has different strengths and interests. We’ve expanded choice programs, including dual language immersion, the health sciences, STEM, and P3 (a personalized learning program). Free Preschool programs are now in every neighborhood school and boast family friendly scheduling options

img.alt: kid with teacher

div.class: wpb_text_column wpb_content_element wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_left-to-right left-to-right vc_custom_1478119396902

div.p: We’ve invested in recruiting and retaining top quality educators who inspire bold thinking, recognize student potential, and encourage all students to work towards their goals. The full school day increases time for teacher planning and development. New curriculum materials in math and ELA along with a laptop for each teacher will support engaging instruction.

img.alt: Print Friendly, PDF & Email
